document_data.mainbody:
Aldor Urnpoleshurst was a lawyer just before the Tyranny of Dragons.
Aldor was very suspicious of others and made accusations over nothing. He was a lawyer in training but a skunk in inclination.
Around 1489 DR, Aldor was forced to escape from Baldurs Gate, probably because hed been involved in a scandal. He boarded a great caravan, which unknown to him was full of Cult of the Dragon agents transporting treasures for the Hoard of the Dragon Queen.
